title: Issues with IP and buying champions again, Does anyone have a fix to this?
body: I am trying to buy Camille but for some reason even though it says i have 7838 IP, i still cant buy her. Says not enouph IP... Does anyone have a fix to this?

replies.body:
Try these general solutions:

+ Restart the client.

+ Swap clients.

+ Try playing one game for IP, and then heading back to buy Camille.

+ Make sure you're buying the actual champion Camille and **NOT the bundle**.

If you try all of those and it still doesn't work, then let me know and I'll look into it a bit further for you :D
